Name: De Ruyter
Fate: Sunk by torpedo in the Java Sea 28 February 1942
Propulsion:
3 × Parsons geared steam turbines
6 × Yarrow boilers
2 × shafts
Armament:
7 × 150 mm (5.9 in) guns (3x2; 1x1)
10 × 40 mm (1.57 in) Bofors anti-aircraft guns (5x2)
8 × 12.7 mm (0.5 in) Browning machine guns
Armor:
Belt: 5 cm (2.0 in)
Deck: 3 cm (1.2 in)
Turrets: 3 cm (1.2 in)
Notes: All of the above are from this references:[1][2]
